KPI.name: BOE_KPIs
KPI.NumberOfWebIReports: select count(si_id) FROM CI_INFOOBJECTS where si_kind = 'webi' and si_instance=0
KPI.NumberOfWebIReportInstances: select count(si_id) FROM CI_INFOOBJECTS where si_kind = 'webi' and si_instance=1
KPI.NumberOfCrystalReports: select count(si_id) FROM CI_INFOOBJECTS where si_kind = 'CrystalReport' and SI_instance = 0
KPI.NumberOfCrystalReportInstances: select count(si_id) FROM CI_INFOOBJECTS where si_kind = 'CrystalReport' and SI_instance = 1
KPI.NumberOfDeskIReports: select count(si_id) FROM CI_INFOOBJECTS where si_kind = 'FullClient' and SI_instance = 0
KPI.NumberOfDeskIReportInstances: select count(si_id) FROM CI_INFOOBJECTS where si_kind = 'FullClient' and SI_instance = 1
KPI.NumberOfXcelcuisModels: select count(si_id) FROM CI_INFOOBJECTS where si_kind = 'Xcelsius' and SI_instance = 0
KPI.NumberOfSWFs: select count(si_id) FROM CI_INFOOBJECTS where si_kind = 'flash' and SI_instance = 0
KPI.NumberOfPrograms: select count(si_id) FROM CI_INFOOBJECTS where si_kind = 'Program' and SI_instance = 0
KPI.NumberOfProgramInstances: select count(si_id) FROM CI_INFOOBJECTS where si_kind = 'Program' and SI_instance = 1
KPI.NumberOfExplorerInfoSpaces: select count(si_id) FROM CI_INFOOBJECTS where si_kind = 'DataDiscovery' and SI_instance = 0
KPI.NumberOfPublications: select count(si_id) FROM CI_INFOOBJECTS where si_kind = 'Publication' and SI_instance = 0
KPI.NumberOfUniverses: select count(si_id) FROM CI_APPOBJECTS where SI_KIND = 'Universe'
KPI.NumberOfConnections: select count(si_id) FROM CI_APPOBJECTS WHERE SI_KIND='MetaData.DataConnection'
KPI.LastUpdateOfUniverses: select top 1 SI_UPDATE_TS FROM CI_APPOBJECTS where si_kind = 'universe' order by SI_UPDATE_TS desc
KPI.NumberOfUserGroups: select count(si_id) FROM CI_SYSTEMOBJECTS where SI_KIND='UserGroup'
KPI.CMSQuery: select top 1 SI_ID, SI_NAME, SI_FRIENDLY_NAME, SI_DESCRIPTION, SI_METRICS, SI_UPDATE_TS from ci_appobjects, ci_systemobjects, ci_infoobjects where si_kind='Server' and si_server_kind='aps' and SI_SERVER_IS_ALIVE='1' ORDER BY SI_ID
KPI.NumberOfEnterpriseNodes: select count(si_id) FROM ci_appobjects, ci_systemobjects, ci_infoobjects where si_kind='EnterpriseNode'
KPI.NumberOfServersRunning: select count(si_id) FROM ci_appobjects, ci_systemobjects, ci_infoobjects where si_kind='Server' and SI_SERVER_IS_ALIVE=1
KPI.NumberOfServersStopped: select count(si_id) FROM ci_appobjects, ci_systemobjects, ci_infoobjects where si_kind='Server' and SI_SERVER_IS_ALIVE=0
KPI.CMSQuery: select SI_ID, SI_NAME, SI_KIND, si_server_kind, SI_FRIENDLY_NAME, SI_DESCRIPTION, SI_METRICS, SI_UPDATE_TS from ci_appobjects, ci_systemobjects, ci_infoobjects where si_kind='Server' and si_server_kind='jobserver' and SI_SERVER_IS_ALIVE='1' ORDER BY SI_ID
